mapper.select: SELECT A.VACATION_POLICY_ID , A.VACATION_POLICY_NAME , A.VACATION_POLICY_DESCRIPTION , A.VACATION_POLICY_STATUS , A.ALLOCATION_DAYS , A.PAID_STATUS , A.YEAR , A.CREATED_AT , A.AUTO_ALLOCATION_CYCLE , B.VACATION_TYPE_NAME FROM VACATION_POLICY A JOIN VACATION_TYPE B ON A.VACATION_TYPE_ID = B.VACATION_TYPE_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #{ year } ORDER BY A.VACATION_POLICY_ID

SELECT A.VACATION_POLICY_ID , A.VACATION_POLICY_NAME , A.VACATION_POLICY_DESCRIPTION , A.VACATION_POLICY_STATUS , A.ALLOCATION_DAYS , A.PAID_STATUS , A.YEAR , A.CREATED_AT , A.AUTO_ALLOCATION_CYCLE , B.VACATION_TYPE_NAME FROM VACATION_POLICY A JOIN VACATION_TYPE B ON A.VACATION_TYPE_ID = B.VACATION_TYPE_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #{ year } AND A.AUTO_ALLOCATION_CYCLE IS NULL ORDER BY A.VACATION_POLICY_ID
